data.title: Christopher Knight Files for Divorce From Adrianne Curry
data.meta_description: Former "Brady Bunch" star cites irreconcilable differences in dissolving five-year marriage
data.text:
Attention, ladies; Peter Brady will officially be back on the market soon.

Former "Brady Bunch" actor Christopher Knight filed for divorce from his wife, Adrianne Curry, in Los Angeles Superior Court on Friday, drawing their five-year marriage to its final chapter.

Read the divorce papers here.

Knight, 53, cites "irreconcilable differences" in the divorce papers. The pair separated on May 30 â€” the day after their fifth wedding anniversary.

Also read: Frampton Comes Alive â€¦ With Divorce Papers

Knight and "America's Next Top Model" season one winner Curry, 29, met while castmates on the fourth season of VH1's "The Surreal Life," and also had a reality series, "My Fair Brady," which ran on VH1 for three seasons from 2005-2008.

Curry took to her Twitter account Wednesday to set matters straight on the divorce, saying that Knight had filed at her request and suggesting that the split was amicable.

"Chris filed cause I TOLD him to. I even announced it the other day ðŸ˜› He paid the 400 fee," Curry wrote, later adding, "I feel like people can't fathom a couple divorcing nicely..we are even having our friends serve each other â€¦ mine was on vid â€¦ hahaha."

Pamela Chelin contributed to this report.
